g-1: ^It is! Or was, maybe. Not too many people need me to cook anything for them anymore.
g-2: ^I'm not sure, really. Haven't gotten around to trying it.

startt: ^You know, I have been craving some of those special pancakes I used to make.
^Do you think you could help me make them?

c-0: ^Oh good! While I start working on the batter, do you think you could find us a good pan to use?

b: ^ Thank you for helping me cook again!
^ Have you found my frying pan?

g-0: ^Trying looking around on the counters, I must have left it around here somewhere.
^My special pancakes need to be flipped six times before they are ready. Just take the pan and keep flipping until it looks done!
^My pancakes have a tendency to go flying, so make sure you catch them on the way down!
